article_title: As ObamaCare Brings Patients, Doctors Not Warm To Medicaid

article_metadata.description: Less than half of doctors are accepting patients insured by Medicaid programs for the poor, according to a study of appointments for common specialties in 15 major U.S. cities. The survey, by physician staffing and consulting firm Merritt Hawkins showed just 45.7 percent Medicaid acceptance as the Affordable Care Act provides a cash [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
